metadata.title: CVE-2024-38624 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Use 64 bit variable to avoid 32 bit overflowFor example, in the expression:	vbo = 2 * vbo + skip
